newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spain names global coordinators for CSI share sale.
newsitem.headline: Spain names global coordinators for CSI share sale.

text.p: Spanish state holding group AIE said on Friday it had named global coordinators for the upcoming privatisation of Corporacion Siderurgica Integral.
CSI, now renamed Aceralia, remains 65 percent in state hands following the sale earlier this week of a 35 percent stake in the group to Luxembourg steel firm Arbed.

A spokesman for AIE told Reuters it had named BBV Interactivos and BCH Banco de Inversoniones as the global coordinators for the national tranche and SBC Warburg as global coordinator for the international tranche.
At a presentation on the Luxembourg deal on Monday, Spain said it would soon privatise a remaining state stake in CSI of 51 to 65 percent.
